Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of The Human Meteor and Initial Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the main character, Human Meteor, his origin, and sets up initial conflicts involving divers and a mysterious car chase, leading to a confrontation and a stowaway plan.

sub_scenes.title: Page 1 Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the comic title, the Human Meteor, and the initial underwater setting with divers.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Taxi and the G-Men Chase
sub_scenes.description: Duke's taxi ride to the waterfront and the subsequent mysterious G-Men car chase, leading to Duke's transformation.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Taxi Ride to the Waterfront

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor Confrontation and Stowaway Plan
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts the suspects, followed by a brief recovery and the initiation of a stowaway plan with Toby.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deception and Duke's Realization
sub_scenes.description: Activities on the yacht deck, a cabin trap, Duke's realization of a setup, and the reveal of Toby's true role.

narrative_arcs.title: Yacht Deck Work and Cabin Trap
Submarine Plot and Toby's True Role

Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Investigation and Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the underwater investigation by Human Meteor, the discovery of the sunken submarine and torpedo plot, leading to direct conflict with enemy divers.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Reconnaissance and Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor's underwater reconnaissance, the arrival of divers, and the discovery of the sunken Japanese submarine and torpedo plot.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Confrontation and Submarine Attack
sub_scenes.description: Encounter and conflict between Human Meteor and divers, leading to submarine crew's reaction and Human Meteor's counter-attack.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers' Initial Encounter with Human Meteor
Human Meteor's Intervention and Divers' Hostility
Human Meteor's Threat and Divers' Retaliation
Namor's Determined Final Attack and Ship Crew's Fear

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Duke's investigation on the yacht, revealing Peter's treachery, and the subsequent aftermath including Holden's recovery and reflection on the day's events.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Confrontation and Map Search
sub_scenes.description: Boat chase to the yacht, confrontation with Peter, and Duke's search for the depth map in Peter's cabin.

narrative_arcs.title: Search for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Exposing Peter's Treachery to the Officer

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Hospital Visit
sub_scenes.description: Fast boat travel, hospital visit to Holden, evening reflection, and Toby's return home.

narrative_arcs.title: Evening Reflection after a Chaotic Day
Toby's Home and Invitation to Visit Holden

Major_Arcs.title: The Bus Garage Nazi Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details a separate storyline involving Skip and Chuck, their encounter with a Nazi spy ring at a bus garage, leading to a confrontation, rescue, and victory over the spies.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance and Bus Garage Mystery
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Skip and Chuck, the arrival of an ambulance, and their discovery of a bus garage address from a dropped wallet.

narrative_arcs.title: Liberty Lads in Action Against Nazis
The Dropped Wallet and the Bus Garage Address
Marine Salutes a Civilian - Major Bronson

sub_scenes.title: Abduction and Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: Confrontation at the bus garage, abduction by Mr. Horst, and their interrogation.

sub_scenes.title: Fight, Escape, and Marine Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Fight at the bus garage, escape order, marine intervention, and the rescue of Major Bronson and the boys.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans in Secret Office
Resolution and Victory Over Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South America - The Kidnapping of Rosita
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Champ and Henry and their South American adventure, focusing on the kidnapping of Rosita and the initial conflict with soldiers.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Setting in South America
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Champ and Henry, and the setting of a sleepy South American town with searching soldiers.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry and the Nazi Threat
Setting the Scene in South America and the Soldiers' Search
Confrontation and Fight in the Desert

sub_scenes.title: Military Suspicion and Escape to Find Consul
sub_scenes.description: Soldiers apprehending and interrogating civilians, Champ and Henry's escape, and their decision to seek help from the American Consul, revealing the reason for suspicion - Rosita's kidnapping.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and the Decision to Seek the American Consul
Explanation of Suspicion: Rosita's Kidnapping and El Tigre

Major_Arcs.title: El Tigre's Hideout and Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the forced car ride, arrival at a house, and the plan to confront El Tigre, culminating in his dramatic reveal at his hideout.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Journey and Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Forced entry into a car, a suspicious car ride, and arrival at a house with mistaken gratitude.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Entry into Car and Commanded Drive
Suspicious Car Ride and Destination Order

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Hideout Infiltration and Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Planning to confront El Tigre, preparation for action, infiltration of El Tigre's hideout using stage dollars, and his dramatic reveal.

narrative_arcs.title: Preparation for Action on Tamale Street
Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout with Stage Dollars

Major_Arcs.title: Rosita's Rescue and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the confrontation with El Tigre, the discovery of Rosita's imprisonment, the rescue mission, and the resolution of the kidnapping.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre Interrogation and Rescue Plan
sub_scenes.description: Confrontation with El Tigre and the initiation of the plan to rescue Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
Ride to Headquarters and Rescue Resolve

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Rescue Action and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Horseback pursuit, infiltration, Rosita's rescue, and the aftermath of the fight.

narrative_arcs.title: Citadel Escape and Rear Entrance Strategy
Machine Gun Deployment and Rosita's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, his combat encounters, disobedience of orders, and eventual capture after setting fire to native huts.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Reporting
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan's jungle combat, reporting to a superior officer, and confession of disobedience.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat with Devil Dog Dolan

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Peril and Capture
sub_scenes.description: Dolan's jungle entrance, exploration, dart attack, ambush by natives, and his capture after setting fire to native huts.

narrative_arcs.title: Note Writing and Plan Negotiation under Duress
Devil Dog's Recovery and Plan Acquisition
Native Huts Ablaze Amidst Marine Assault

Major_Arcs.title: Dolan and the Natives - Homage and Alliance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Dolan's unexpected encounter with natives, leading to a fight, the Chief's death, and a surprising turn of events where the natives show homage and form an alliance with Grauer.

sub_scenes.title: Native Encounter and Chief's Death
sub_scenes.description: Dolan's jungle entrance, fight with natives, and the Chief's accidental death.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan's Jungle Entrance and Initial Encounter
Fight with Natives and Chief's Demise
Grauer's Dialogue with Native and Alliance

Major_Arcs.title: Captain's Dilemma and Dolan's Discipline
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the Captain's difficult decision due to Grauer's demands, the attack on Sam, and the resolution with Dolan being disciplined but ultimately recognized for his service.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Decision and Attack on Sam
sub_scenes.description: Captain's dilemma regarding Grauer's demands, and the sudden attack on Sam.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Rescinded and Dolan's Discipline

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc serves as a brief introduction to the new storyline featuring the Twinkle Twins and their fight against ruthless killers.

sub_scenes.title: Twinkle Twins Story Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and the premise of their story.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Burgess Murder Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Twinkle Twins as they investigate the murder of Robert Burgess, leading them to Tom Reilly, a hospital visit, and a community effort to save Reilly's life, culminating in the arrest of Farnacci and resolution of the case.

sub_scenes.title: Newspaper Office Briefing and Initial Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Briefing at the newspaper office about the Burgess murder and initial evidence pointing to Tom Reilly, leading to a visit to the police station and hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Newspaper Office Briefing on Burgess Murder
Police Station Inquiry about Reilly's Skip

sub_scenes.title: Blood Transfusion and Community Support for Reilly
sub_scenes.description: Discovery of Reilly's blood disease and the need for Farnacci's blood, phone call to Elijah for research, news report clarifying connections, and the decision to find Reilly in the Irish section.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Call to Elijah about Farnacci
Decision to Locate Tom Reilly in Irish Section
Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation about Reilly and Farnacci
Reilly's Coal Chute Escape and Diane's Pursuit
Ambulance Transport and Concern for Victims
Failed Blood Donation Match and Community Appeal
Urgent Call for Blood and Community Response
Decision to Arrest Farnacci and Police Action
Police Raid on Poolroom and Arrest
